thread.title: David Pearson

author: David Pearson
title: David Pearson
text:
App needs internal navigation. Transition from app to nav is clunky and causes delayed reaction causing rerouting, leading to large delays while driving and frequent cancelations. One almost needs to pull over to deal with it while on the road... unsafe and low customer service for riders.
"Total earnings" is deceptive. This reports total fares not earnings. Earnings implies amount earned by driver, for driver. You may be confusing revenue with earnings... which makes it seem higher than actual while gauging drive by drive, daily and weekly actual earnings to goals, Let your rates stand up to the comparison sniff test without driver calculation or estimation.
